analysisEngineMetaData.name: uima-svm-classification-annotator
analysisEngineMetaData.description: Annotates the classification result of SVM

configurationParameter.name: svmModelFile
configurationParameter.description: The model file for this SVM classifier.

configurationParameter.name: svmFVFactoryClassName
configurationParameter.description: The name of the class, which follows com.maalaang.omtwitter.uima.ml.SvmFVFactory interface, for generating feature vector based on the annotations.

configurationParameter.name: svmTargetUpdatorClassName
configurationParameter.description: The name of the class, which follows com.maalaang.omtwitter.uima.ml.SvmTargetUpdator interface, for updating the annotation regarding the classification result from SVM.
